title: Business Highlights: Microsoft buys Activision, stocks swoon
description: ___ Microsoft buys game maker Activision Blizzard for about $70B REDMOND, Wash. (AP) — Microsoft is paying nearly $70 billion for Activision Blizzard, the maker of Candy Crush and Call of Duty.
